share on x mb michele bartik. jun 13 at 9:16 am lit a candle in memory of ronald p. kleinberger. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jeannie balogh. jun 12 at 12:48 pm sympathy to the entire family. prayers to each of you. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x bs bill schroeder. jun 11 at 8:07 pm to the kleinberger family, i am truly sorry to hear of the passing of ron. he was a very hard worker and was well respected in the community. i always enjoyed bumping into him and having a good laugh he will be greatly missed. ron, alex, & lucas. words cant express what you must be feeling but i truly hope that the god of peace will surround you and the rest of the family through this very tough time... comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jp janet putnam. jun 11 at 3:34 pm 4 files added to the album new album name comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x bb betsy burt. jun 11 at 9:36 am lit a candle in memory of ronald p. kleinberger. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x bb betsy burt. jun 11 at 9:36 am our thoughts and prayers are with the kleinberger family. i sing in the choir at st. vincent de paul church with paul. we think a lot of paul and rosita and are sorry for your loss. betsy & howard burt. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x kt kay thorington. jun 10 at 10:01 am mrs. & mr. kleinberger, john and the rest of the kleinberger family:so sorry to hear about the loss of ron. thoughts & prayers to all of you during this most difficult time. may your many happy memories of ron carry you through the days, weeks and months ahead. i remember seeing ron along with the rest of your family at st. vincent de pauls church as we all were growing up. comment get order flowers now for ronald 's mass of christian burial cemetery details. slate hill cemetery. slate hill rd. sharon springs, ny, us, 13459. get show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of ronald p. kleinberger send comfort to the kleinberger family when it's needed most. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! mm maggi mondorejun 14 at 11:55 am i only knew ron for a short time. he was an amazing person with a good heart... he left me with a lot of encouragement... i will truly miss him and treasure the moments that we shared together. to rons family... know he is with you in you... my deepest sympathies... comment share comment share facebook twitter
